intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At {companyName}, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of personal information:

items.email: Email address and name for account creation and authentication
items.payment: Payment information processed securely through Stripe (we do not store credit card details)
items.usage: Usage data and analytics to improve our service
items.cookies: Cookies and similar technologies for functionality and analytics

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.intro: We use your personal data to:

items.communication: Send you service updates, security alerts, and support messages
items.improvements: Analyze usage to improve our products and services
items.legal: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.intro: We share your data only with trusted service providers:

yourRights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.erasure: Right to request deletion of your data
rights.portability: Right to receive your data in a portable format
rights.objection: Right to object to processing of your data
rights.withdrawal: Right to withdraw consent at any time

yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for authentication and optional analytics cookies. You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contact.updatePrompt: ⚠️ Remember to update this contact information with your actual legal contact details before launching to production.

intro.title: What Are Cookies
intro.content: {companyName} uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience, analyze usage, and for marketing purposes. This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can control them.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

items.session: Session cookies for authentication and account access
items.auth: Authentication tokens to keep you logged in securely
items.preferences: User preferences and settings (language, theme, etc.)

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website. We use this data to improve our service.

items.usage: Track which pages you visit and how you navigate the site
items.performance: Monitor site performance and identify technical issues

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies (Optional)
marketing.description: These cookies are used to show you relevant ads and measure campaign effectiveness. You can opt out at any time.

items.googleAds: Google Ads: Track ad conversions and campaign performance
items.metaPixel: Meta Pixel: Measure Facebook/Instagram ad effectiveness

manage.title: How to Manage Cookies
manage.content: You can control cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner. You can also block cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect site functionality.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Terms and conditions for using our service

warning.title: Review with Legal Professional
warning.message: These Terms have been generated with your company data. Review with a legal professional familiar with your jurisdiction before launch.

intro.title: Agreement to Terms
intro.content: By accessing or using {companyName}, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. You are responsible for safeguarding your password and for all activities under your account.

items.illegal: Use the service for any illegal purposes or in violation of any laws
items.harm: Attempt to interfere with or compromise the system integrity or security
items.abuse: Abuse, harass, threaten, or intimidate other users
items.spam: Send unsolicited or unauthorized advertising or promotional material

payments.title: Payments and Billing
payments.content: Some parts of the service are billed on a subscription basis. You will be billed in advance on a recurring basis. Payments are non-refundable except as required by law.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including breach of these Terms.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall {companyName} be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
